## Vector3.FromArrayToRef() method

Sets the given vector "result" with the element values from the index "offset" of the given array

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static FromArrayToRef(array: ArrayLike<number>, offset: number, result: Vector3): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | <code>ArrayLike&lt;number&gt;</code> | defines the source array |
|  offset | <code>number</code> | defines the offset in the source array |
|  result | <code>Vector3</code> | defines the Vector3 where to store the result |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
